What kind of resources are available for troubleshooting and optimizing Verus on Linux systems?

There are several resources available for troubleshooting and optimizing Verus on Linux systems, including guides on installing the Linux CLI wallet, calculating time to unlock for immature rewards, making mining life easier with Linux Bash scripts, and resolving errors such as "Cannot obtain lock on data directory" and "error while loading shared libraries: libgomp.so.1 and/or zlib1g-dev". Additionally, there are guides on compiling Monkins Verus enhanced CCMiner for various hardware, creating a PHP staking interface for coinshielding nodes, and performing low priority pool-mining.
